article.name: I configured AWS Integration, but the host won’t integrate with Mackerel
article.title: I configured AWS Integration, but the host won’t integrate with Mackerel
article.body:
• Is the required IAM policy attached to the IAM role that was created in the IAM Management Console?
  • Does the service require additional attachment of the CloudWatchReadOnlyAccess policy when only one service is integrated with the created IAM role?
  • Are there any mistakes in the specified tags used when filtering?
  • Do you need to add an additional IAM policy when filtering with tags?
    • Check the settings in the help page https://mackerel.io/docs/entry/integrations/aws#tag
  • In addition to IAM policies, it may be necessary to individually configure settings for integrating with services such as Amazon S3.
    • AWS Integration - S3 - Mackerel Docs
